description: This vulnerability allowed remote attackers to exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.
This vulnerability allowed for arbitrary code execution.
versions_prior_to: 125.0.6422.112/.113 for Windows and Mac, 125.0.6422.112 for Linux.
fix: Upgrade to version 125.0.6422.112/.113 for Windows and Mac, or version 125.0.6422.112 for Linux.

description: These vulnerabilities allowed for remote code execution.
versions_prior_to: 124.0.6367.60/.61 for Windows and Mac, 124.0.6367.60 for Linux.
Office 365 Business Edition Semi-Annual Channel Version 1803 (Build 9126.2382) and earlier.
fix: Upgrade to the latest version of Microsoft Office.

description: Vulnerability that allows controlled content writes at arbitrary paths.
fix: Upgrade to the latest version of Git.

description: Vulnerability that may be used to inject arbitrary configuration settings, leading to code execution.
fix: Upgrade to the latest version of Git.

description: An attacker could achieve code execution in the content process by exploiting a use-after-free in Animation timelines.
Unauthenticated attacker can view sensitive information.
fix: Upgrade to the latest version of Jira Software.
Upgrade to Docker Desktop version 4.34.2 or later.
Update to version 1.1.12 of runC and version 0.12.5 of BuildKit.
